title: Love, Sex & Throuple Trouble
overview: Faced with a failing marriage, LAPD detective and airline baggage handler find renewed passion when they bring Athena into their marriage for their first throuple relationship.Trouble begins when Vannas police partner Charles suspects Athena was involved in a recent bank robbery. Is Charles spoiling the honeymoon of his partners alternative marriage, or is there really something amiss in Love, Sex & Throuple Trouble?
